import React from "react"; import api from '../utils/Api.js' function Main(props) { const [userName, setUserName] = React.useState(); const [userDescription, setUserDescription] = React.useState(); const [userAvatar, setUserAvatar] = React.useState(); React.useEffect(() => { Promise(api.getUserInfo()) }) return(

{userName}

{userDescription}

) } export default Main
